item.title: ‘Foundation’ Renewed for Season 4 at Apple TV+
item.description: The sci-fi series is set to go back into production in early 2026.

item.title: ‘Foundation’ Renewed for Season 4 at Apple TV+
item.description: The sci-fi series is set to go back into production in early 2026.

item.title: Despite Being Set in 2024, ‘The Morning Show’ Won’t Address Trump’s Reelection in Season 4
item.description: A time jump picks things up two years after the events of season three, but “this season ends right before the election,” EP Mimi Leder confirms.

item.title: Ben Folds on Writing for Charlie Brown, When Music Lost Its Sense of Humor, and How “Stupid” the Critics Were About Billy Joel
